nodes.documentation:
@dev Multi-Fungible Tokens with minting and burning methods. These methods assume
     a parent contract to be executed as they are `internal` functions
nodes.name: ERC1155MintBurn
_mint
_batchMint
_burn
_batchBurn

nodes.documentation:
@dev Multi-Fungible Tokens with minting and burning methods. These methods assume
     a parent contract to be executed as they are `internal` functions
nodes.name: ERC1155MintBurn
_mint
_batchMint
_burn
_batchBurn

devdoc.details: Multi-Fungible Tokens with minting and burning methods. These methods assume     a parent contract to be executed as they are `internal` functions

params._owner: The address of the token holder

balanceOf(address,uint256).return: The _owner's balance of the Token type requested

params._owners: The addresses of the token holders

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).return: The _owner's balance of the Token types requested (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair)

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: True if the operator is approved, false if not

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`
Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators

params._interfaceID: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165

balanceOf(address,uint256).notice: Get the balance of an account's Tokens

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).notice: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Queries the approval status of an operator for a given owner

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.notice: Send multiple types of Tokens from the _from address to the _to address (with safety call)

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Transfers amount amount of an _id from the _from address to the _to address specified

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage all of caller's tokens

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Query if a contract implements an interface
